title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Be proactive and manage a cold shoulder from a workmate or team member as soon as you feel the chill in the air. You might not want to deal with a confrontation today, or you may even think that things will blow over on their own. However, your perception could be off now that sensitive Venus forms an uneasy square to stodgy Saturn. Check out your assumptions before concluding that something is wrong. Perhaps the more open your approach, the more the other person will open up and share whats really going on. Your honesty saves everyone time, but your compassion changes the game. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
